short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove restrictions on website copy content, it is easy to copy website content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Copy is a Browser extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by removing restrictions on copying content from web pages. With this extension, you can freely copy and share any text or information without any hassles.
